Articles.Content:
The Engineers were all out celebrating the invention of their new command chair, but unfortunately forgot to lock up the assembly building before they left. Jebediah found his way in after returning from the bar and thought the chair would move much faster if it but had wheels. With the help of a few friends, and a few beers, they put together the largest family sedan for the modern space age that the world will never see.

The vehicle hit a top speed of 32 kps before running out of runway, leaving each of them wondering why they dawned their gravity suits for test run. Regardless, they were all pretty proud of their accomplishment and headed off to celebrate. No word as yet to where they left the car, last seen as the Rocketman's Bar and Grill.
